name: GBC Swingline Laminating Sheets, Thermal Laminating Pouches, Badge/ID Card Size, 10 Mil, HeatSeal LongLife, 100 Pack (3202104)
short_description: HIGH QUALITY – Create sharp results with our clear and crisp laminating pouches, which help keep your documents vividly bright and durably protected.
LASTING PRESERVATION – Documents stay bold and distinct with the unique UV coating, which prevents fading and discoloration. Perfect for items that need to be preserved or are frequently used.
DURABLE PROTECTION – The 10 mil thick pouches create rigid documents that are fully protected against wear and tear. ID badge pouches measure 2-9/16" x 3-3/4". Pack includes 100 pouches.
THERMAL MACHINE COMPATIBLE – Pouches are compatible with any thermal laminator, including the GBC Fusion 7000L and GBC HeatSeal H700, sold separately.

Make sure your documents last. GBC Long-life Thermal Laminating Pouches create clear results that stay sharp and bold over time. Both durable and long-lasting, these pouches are perfect for items that will be used daily.
product_description: Create sharp results with our clear and crisp GBC LongLife Thermal Laminating Pouches. These pouches will help keep your documents vividly bright and durably protected. Documents stay bold and distinct with the unique UV coating, which prevents fading and discoloration. Perfect for items that need to be preserved or are frequently used. The 10 mil thick pouches create rigid documents that are fully protected against wear and tear. ID badge pouches measure 2-9/16" x 3-3/4". Pack includes 100 pouches. Pouches are compatible with any thermal laminator, including the GBC Fusion 7000L and GBC HeatSeal H700, sold separately.

product_description: Product Description Scotch Thermal Laminating Pouches protect important items you handle frequently like ID badges, luggage tags and more. These 5 mil thick thermal laminating pouches are for use with thermal laminators and create a permanent seal for long-term protection. Pouche deliver a clear, professional and photo-safe finish. Ideal for use in the home, office and classroom. Contains 10 thermal pouches with 10 clips. Size 2 in. x 4 in. Try other quality products from Scotch Brand for all your needs in the home and office. From the Manufacturer Laminating pouches are designed for use with the 3M Scotch Thermal Laminator or any standard thermal-pouch laminator. Pouches provide instant two-sided protection for frequently handled documents and photos.

name: Binditek 100 Pack 5mil Thermal Laminating Pouches, 2.5 x 4.25 Inches Laminating Sheets with Hole, ID Badge Without Clip, Ultra Clear, HeatSeal, Glossy, for Students and Coworkers
short_description: 【ID Badge without Clip, with Hole】 The thermal laminating pouch has a width of 2.5 inches and a length of 4.25 inches, capable of holding cards up to 2.25" x 4" in size.

【5 Mil & Sturdy Material】 The 5 mil thickness of thermal laminating pouches ensures exceptional robustness, preventing easy breakage and deformation. They effectively shield your ID card from bends and surface moisture, offering waterproof protection that guarantees longevity even with frequent handling.
【Machine Required】 A box of 100 thermal laminating pouches ensures long-term productivity for your daily needs. It is compatible with most laminators.

【Bright Clarity】 These thermal laminating pouches feature top-quality PET material, providing high transparency that allows ID badges to be easily visible beneath the finish. Additionally, they protect the contents from discoloration.

【Round Corners】 The round corner design offers a comfortable grip and prevents hand injuries. Thermal laminating pouches can preserve ID badges, name tags, and more. They are suitable for use in school offices or at home, making them an excellent choice for teachers, students, and colleagues.
